name: ts-mcp
description: Advanced debugging capabilities for Node.js and TypeScript applications with 25+ debugging tools including breakpoints, variable inspection, execution control, performance profiling, and hang detection
author: Digital Defiance, Jessica Mulein

tools.name: debugger_start
tools.description: Start debugging a Node.js/TypeScript process with inspector attachment

tools.name: debugger_set_breakpoint
tools.description: Set breakpoints with optional conditions at specific file locations

tools.name: debugger_continue
tools.description: Continue execution until next breakpoint or completion

tools.name: debugger_step_over
tools.description: Execute next line without entering function calls

tools.name: debugger_step_into
tools.description: Step into function calls for detailed debugging

tools.name: debugger_step_out
tools.description: Step out of current function to calling context

tools.name: debugger_pause
tools.description: Pause execution at current point

tools.name: debugger_inspect
tools.description: Evaluate expressions and inspect variables in current context

tools.name: debugger_get_local_variables
tools.description: Get all local variables in current scope with values and types

tools.name: debugger_get_global_variables
tools.description: Get global variables accessible from current scope

tools.name: debugger_inspect_object
tools.description: Deep inspect object properties with configurable depth limits

tools.name: debugger_add_watch
tools.description: Add expressions to watch list for continuous monitoring

tools.name: debugger_remove_watch
tools.description: Remove expressions from watch list

tools.name: debugger_get_watches
tools.description: Get all watched expressions with current values and change detection

tools.name: debugger_get_stack
tools.description: Get current call stack with absolute file paths and line numbers

tools.name: debugger_switch_stack_frame
tools.description: Switch debugging context to different stack frame

tools.name: debugger_remove_breakpoint
tools.description: Remove breakpoints by ID

tools.name: debugger_toggle_breakpoint
tools.description: Enable or disable breakpoints without removing them

tools.name: debugger_list_breakpoints
tools.description: List all breakpoints with their current state and conditions

tools.name: debugger_detect_hang
tools.description: Run processes and detect infinite loops or hanging execution

tools.name: debugger_stop_session
tools.description: Stop debug session and cleanup all resources

tools.name: debugger_set_logpoint
tools.description: Set non-breaking breakpoints that log messages with variable interpolation

tools.name: debugger_set_exception_breakpoint
tools.description: Break on caught/uncaught exceptions with optional filtering

tools.name: debugger_set_function_breakpoint
tools.description: Break when specific functions are called (supports regex patterns)

tools.name: debugger_start_cpu_profile
tools.description: Start CPU profiling for performance analysis and bottleneck detection

tools.name: debugger_stop_cpu_profile
tools.description: Stop CPU profiling and get flame graph data

tools.name: debugger_take_heap_snapshot
tools.description: Take heap snapshot for memory analysis and leak detection

tools.name: debugger_get_performance_metrics
tools.description: Get performance metrics and timeline data
